snippet.title: Viscera Cleanup Detail: Santa's Rampage - Launch
snippet.description:
Grab it on Steam here: http://store.steampowered.com/app/265210

Santa has had enough. He snapped, and devastation at his workshop ensued. It's your job now to clean it all up!

A Christmas themed, stand-alone minigame of Viscera Cleanup Detail, the space-station janitor simulator! It's also available with all pre-orders (along with VCD: Shadow Warrior).

Check out the website here, and consider pre-ordering the full Viscera Cleanup Detail game:
http://www.runestorm.com/viscera

Follow Viscera Cleanup Detail and RuneStorm on Twitter and Facebook:
https://twitter.com/visceracleanup
https://twitter.com/runestormgames
https://www.facebook.com/runestorm
